Thesaurus: synonyms, antonyms, and examples
a mistakemistakeIt was just a silly mistake - no need to apologize.errorHe admitted that he'd made an error.blunderThe company was struggling after a series of financial blunders.slipIt was an understandable slip.mix-upThere was a mix-up with the bags at the airport.gaffeI made a real gaffe by calling her "Emma", which is the name of his previous girlfriend.
